#summary Explains how to use depend_components.

= Introduction =

*Depend components* is a tool made for automatic detection of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circular_dependency circular dependencies] (or [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strongly_connected_component strongly connected components]) between modules. This tool will return an *error* code if any circular dependency is found and produce an xml containing all detected components.

{{{
<strongly-connected-components>
    <component>
        <node>unit1</node>
        <node>unit2</node>
     </component>
</strongly-connected-components>
}}}

= Command line parameters =

{{{Usage: depend_components [options] --graph=graph.xml --output=components.xml}}}

 * *help*(-h): produce help message
 * *version*(-v): produce version message
 * *output*: set output components file
 * *graph*: set graph input file (from [UsingDepend depend]) for analysis
 * *disable-warnings*: disable console warnings
